H0.text: Where in the human body might you develop Meibomian cysts. Nose

H1.text: Where in the human body might you develop Meibomian cysts. Lip

H2.text: Where in the human body might you develop Meibomian cysts. Ear

H3.text: Where in the human body might you develop Meibomian cysts. Eyelid

A4.text: A chalazion or meibomian cyst is a granuloma in the eyelid that results from a blocked meibomian gland.

A5.text: It typically occurs in the middle of the eyelid, is red, and is not painful.
